name: com.latios.latiosframework
description:
Latios Framework for DOTS is a collection of tools, algorithms, and API extensions developed by a hardcore hobbyist game developer.

This package includes all of the following packages:
▪ Core
▪ Psyshock Physics
▪ Myri Audio
▪ Kinemation Animation and Rendering

Examples: 
▪ Latios Space Shooter Sample - https://github.com/Dreaming381/lsss-wip/tree/v0.4.5
▪ Mini Demos - https://github.com/Dreaming381/LatiosFrameworkMiniDemos

samples.description: Tests for the Optimization Adventures article series in the Documentation
Simple scenes and logic showcasing Physics.FindPairs capabilities
Simple scenes showing how to set up Myri and play clips at randomized positions with spatialization
